Text: This is a rubbish program that does little other than waste bandwidth.  Why hassle your contacts with it ?

Machloop: Keep your idiot-comment for your self. I have been using incredimail in several years now, and are satisfied. Much fun. stabil and most of all - use much bandwith - that`s new. It use much less than other program for example Outlook.

Thanks argoboy for your effort, and upload. Keep up the good work.
